You smell funny. What have you been doing?

Oh no! It's not you, it's me! You see, there, on my boot? Ghillie poo. Must have stepped in some on the way to work. Happens all too often.

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has some work for you, if you're interested. I'm gonna have to clean up.

Your timing is impeccable. The Hands require materials that are currently walking around near the {@Rgn:23001#Lake of Tears}.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to track down some monsters, and bring us some trophies.

Look at this! Plenty for our purposes.

Thanks, . See {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}.

The Hands need top-notch armor. Trouble is, we can't afford it.

Travel to the {@Rgn:23001#Lake of Tears} and expropriate some from the {@LinkCreature:23#9#molten fangspawns}.

If it can protect a fangspawn, it can protect us. We've got the skills to fashion whatever you retrieve into something we can use.

Wonderful! You're so awesome.

Tell {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} I said we should give you a bonusâ€”not that she ever listens to me.

We're running low on armor. Turns out that stuff has to be replaced when you constantly skirmish with arachnens and kulkaris.

Would you mind prying some off the corpses of a few {@LinkCreature:23#13#searing fangspawns} near the {@Rgn:23001#Lake of Tears}?

You'll have to turn them into corpses first, of course.
Ah, that's the stuff. Tell {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} I'll get to work on these right away.

We'd like you to head to the {@Rgn:23001#Lake of Tears} and bring back the dust generated by {@LinkCreature:23#14#lurking teraliths}.

The dust makes for a rich, strong clay when mixed with water and few other secret ingredients.

I can use it to make all kinds of things, from pottery to bludgeoning tools. In case you hadn't noticed, I'm crafty.
Thank you, <PCNAME>. Sometimes I wonder if the Hands of Velika are worthy of your service.
